ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Upgrades.
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes!! Woodelves can now wear Hero Bracers, traded with a guild mate for one last night, gave him a TBB for the hero bracer (was gonna give him the TBB anyway).
ygData.messageBody:
Yes!! Woodelves can now wear Hero Bracers, traded with a guild mate for one
last night, gave him a TBB for the hero bracer (was gonna give him the TBB
anyway). I love the green plate look and it's now bumped my strength right
back upto 99 (my str was low because I replaced my TBB with a sash =)





"Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...> on
13/04/2000 23:24:40

Please respond to eqbards@egroups.com

To: "'eqbards@egroups.com'" <eqbards@egroups.com>
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Upgrades.





> Head - BI Crown/Froglok Crown (mostly the BI, I need the str)

stick with froglok, AC and resists are more important, and the most
important is looks! =)

> Ears - Opalline Earrings (considering some +4 str, +2 int)

these are great unless you want a diamondine in the future.

> Face - Mask of the Deceiver

you'll always wear this =)

> Neck - Gold Black Pearl Choker

i'm big on AC, so i would go with a very inexpensive splitpaw necklace 2AC
5CHA, unless you can get or afford a runed lava pendant.

> Cloak - White Wolfhide Cloak (considering an Icebear cloak)

same as me, gonna try icebear for a while.

> Shoulders - Bloodstained Mantle

carnal pauldrons for free in sol b king hall, or crested are really nice
AC.

> Chest - Black Enamelled Chestplate

that or lambent.

> Arms - Lambent

no upgrade unless you can get mithril on an FG raid.

> Bracers - Both Lambent (I'm a wood elf, can't wear a hero bracer)

you can now or so i hear =)

> Gloves - Lambent

about as good as you can get.

> Rings - +7 cha/+5 dex rings

i would get jagged which are inexpensive, or spend a little and get plat
fire opal rings (i think in another message i accidentally said plat fire
emerald, i meant these) 5ac 55hp each.

> Belt - Trollhide belt

haste sash? =)

> Pants - Lambent

mithril if you get in on FGs soon.

> Boots - Lambent

these work.

> Ranged - Runed Bone Fork

same.

> Weapons - 1 Ykesha, Black Enamelled Mace, Ashenwood Shortspear

another yak, or an EBW and you're gtg.

i know you are level 40 and forgive me if some of these items are for level
50s, but hell level 5 bards have today what took me 3 months at level 50 to
get, so my point of view is off =)

Shada
